title: Antalya 7-Day Beach Holiday
description: Enjoy a perfect week-long beach holiday in Antalya, Turkey's stunning Mediterranean coastline. This all-inclusive package features luxurious beachfront accommodation, daily breakfast buffets, and access to private beach clubs. Explore ancient ruins, take boat trips to secluded coves, and experience traditional Turkish cuisine. Perfect for couples seeking relaxation and adventure.

title: Antalya Premium 5★ All Inclusive
description: Experience ultimate luxury with our premium 5-star all-inclusive package in Antalya. Stay at an award-winning resort with infinity pools, world-class spa facilities, and gourmet dining options. Includes private transfers, exclusive excursions to Pamukkale thermal pools, and personalized concierge service throughout your stay.

title: Budget City Break in Istanbul
description: Perfect for solo travelers, this budget-friendly Istanbul city break covers all major attractions. Visit Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, and Grand Bazaar. Includes centrally located accommodation, public transport pass, and guided walking tours. Experience the magical blend of European and Asian cultures.

title: Dubai: Beach & City Experience
description: Discover the best of Dubai with this balanced beach and city experience. Enjoy Jumeirah Beach days, visit Burj Khalifa, explore traditional souks, and experience desert safaris. Package includes beachfront hotel, daily breakfast, and tickets to major attractions including Dubai Mall aquarium.

title: Dubai Luxury 5★ Experience
description: Indulge in the ultimate Dubai luxury experience. Stay at iconic 5-star hotels like Burj Al Arab or Atlantis The Palm. Includes private helicopter tour over Palm Jumeirah, exclusive shopping experiences, Michelin-star dining, and personalized luxury car transfers. Perfect for special occasions and luxury seekers.

title: Phuket 8-Day Tropical Escape
description: Escape to Thailand's tropical paradise with this 8-day Phuket package. Relax on pristine beaches, explore Phi Phi Islands, experience vibrant nightlife at Patong Beach, and indulge in authentic Thai massages. Includes beachfront resort, island hopping tours, and cooking class.

title: Bangkok & Phuket Combo Tour
description: Experience the perfect blend of city excitement and beach relaxation with our Bangkok & Phuket combo tour. Explore Bangkok's temples and floating markets, then unwind on Phuket's beautiful beaches. Includes domestic flights, guided tours in Bangkok, and beach resort accommodation in Phuket.

title: Georgia: Tbilisi & Mountains
description: Discover Georgia's stunning capital and majestic mountains. Explore Tbilisi's old town, visit ancient churches, taste famous Georgian wine, and journey to the Caucasus mountains. Includes traditional Georgian meals, wine tasting tours, and comfortable mountain lodge accommodation.

title: Georgia Gastronomy Tour
description: A culinary journey through Georgia's wine region. Visit local vineyards, participate in cooking classes, explore food markets, and taste traditional dishes like khinkali and khachapuri. Perfect for food and wine enthusiasts looking to experience authentic Georgian culture.

title: Rome & Vatican Highlights
description: Perfect for solo travelers, this Rome tour covers all major historical sites. Skip-the-line access to Colosseum and Vatican Museums, guided tours of ancient Roman ruins, and authentic Italian dining experiences. Includes centrally located accommodation and comprehensive city transport pass.

title: Italy: Rome & Florence
description: Experience Italy's art and history capitals. Explore Rome's ancient wonders and Florence's Renaissance masterpieces. Includes high-speed train between cities, guided Uffizi Gallery tour, Vatican visit, and Tuscan countryside day trip with wine tasting.

title: Paris: City of Love
description: Romantic Paris getaway perfect for couples. Includes Eiffel Tower visit, Seine River cruise, Montmartre walking tour, Louvre Museum tickets, and romantic dinner with Seine views. Stay in charming boutique hotel in the Latin Quarter.

title: Barcelona City Break
description: Discover Gaudí's masterpiece city. Visit Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, Gothic Quarter, and enjoy tapas tours. Includes skip-the-line tickets to major attractions, flamenco show, and beach time at Barceloneta. Perfect for culture and architecture enthusiasts.

title: Maldives Paradise Escape
description: Ultimate luxury overwater bungalow experience in the Maldives. Private villa with direct lagoon access, gourmet dining, spa treatments, snorkeling with manta rays, and romantic sunset cruises. All-inclusive package with seaplane transfers.

title: Sri Lanka: Ocean & Tea Plantations
description: Diverse Sri Lanka tour combining beaches, tea country, and cultural sites. Visit ancient temples, tea plantations, wildlife safaris, and beach relaxation. Includes train ride through tea country, elephant orphanage visit, and Ayurvedic spa experience.

title: Bali: Surf & Relax
description: Perfect balance of adventure and relaxation in Bali. Surf lessons in Kuta, yoga retreat in Ubud, temple visits, and beach club experiences. Includes private villa accommodation, traditional Balinese massage, and rice terrace tours.

title: Cyprus Family Holiday
description: Family-friendly Cyprus holiday with activities for all ages. Water parks, beach days, ancient ruins exploration, and boat trips. Family-sized apartment accommodation, kids' clubs, and special family dining options included.

title: Prague Weekend Escape
description: Perfect weekend getaway in magical Prague. Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, Old Town Square, and traditional Czech beer tasting. Includes river cruise, astronomical clock viewing, and medieval dinner show.

title: Vietnam: Hanoi & Nha Trang
description: Experience Vietnam's vibrant capital and beautiful beaches. Hanoi's old quarter, Halong Bay cruise, Nha Trang beach relaxation, and authentic Vietnamese cuisine. Includes domestic flights, cooking classes, and beach resort accommodation.

title: Japan: Tokyo & Kyoto
description: Classic Japan tour combining modern Tokyo and traditional Kyoto. Bullet train experience, Tokyo skyscrapers, Kyoto temples, authentic tea ceremony, and sushi making class. Includes Japan Rail Pass and traditional ryokan stay.
